data.question: What is the empirical formula of the synthesized MOF material?
What crystal system does the synthesized MOF material belong to?
What is the space group of the synthesized MOF material?
What is the calculated density (Dcalc) of the synthesized MOF material in Mg/m3?
What is the formula weight of the synthesized MOF material?
What is the maximum temperature (K) at which the unit cell data was obtained for [Cu(bcppm)H2O]-ace?
What is the change in the a-axis (Å) of [Cu(bcppm)H2O]-ace from 303K to 403K?
data.answer: The a-axis changes from 19.65 Å at 303K to 20.54 Å at 403K.

data.question: Is the synthesized MOF material thermally stable up to 285 °C?
Does the synthesized MOF material undergo a 2D-to-3D transformation upon heating?
Is the CO2 adsorption enthalpy for the synthesized MOF material higher than 30 kJ/mol?
Can the synthesized MOF material be regenerated by heating in methanol at 65 °C?
Does the synthesized MOF material show a higher adsorption capacity for CO2 compared to N2 at 293 K?
What is the CO2/N2 selectivity of the synthesized MOF material at 293 K and 1 atm?
What is the initial enthalpy of adsorption for CO2 in the synthesized MOF material?
Does the synthesized MOF material retain its crystallinity after being soaked in water for 24 hours?
What is the limiting pore size of the synthesized MOF material according to the single-crystal data?
Is the synthesized MOF material's structure locked in a contracted state upon CO2 adsorption?
What is the role of the SQUEEZE routine in the analysis of the synthesized MOF material?
data.answer: It is used to account for diffuse electron density peaks that could not be adequately identified and refined as solvent.

data.question: Does the synthesized MOF material exhibit a color change from blue to green upon activation?
What is the role of Ideal-Adsorbed Solution Theory (IAST) in the study of the synthesized MOF material?
data.answer: IAST is used to predict the adsorption of a gas mixture based on the information for pure components.
